Ingredients.5: 1 salt and ground black pepper to taste

Ingredients.8: 2 tablespoons chicken-flavored demi-glace, or to taste

Ingredients.11: 1 teaspoon chopped fresh parsley, or to taste

Directions.1: Place flour into a shallow dish. Mix butter and garlic together in a small bowl until well combined.

Directions.2: Use a very sharp knife to slice horizontally through the thick part of each chicken breast to about 1/2 inch from the thinner edge; be careful not to cut all the way through. Open each breast like a book and place onto a work surface. Gently pound each breast to a uniform thickness, then dredge on both sides with flour.

Directions.3: Melt garlic butter in a large skillet over medium heat until it stops foaming. Add chicken and cook until golden brown, 6 to 8 minutes per side. Season with salt and pepper. Remove to a platter and cover to keep warm.

Directions.4: Cook mushrooms in remaining butter in the skillet until beginning to turn brown at the edges, 5 to 7 minutes. Stir in wine, demi-glace, lemon juice, and capers. Reduce the heat to a simmer, season with salt and pepper, and stir in parsley.

Directions.5: Transfer chicken to plates and spoon sauce over top. Garnish with lemon slices.
